entities.name: harry
entities.description: Hermione asks if Harry is all right after they are attacked.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hagrid whispers to Hermione and then pulls her behind a tree with Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who pulls Harry and Hermione behind a tree and prepares to fire his crossbow.

relationships.description: Hagrid seizes Harry and hoists him off the path.
Hagrid seizes Hermione and hoists her off the path.
Hagrid pulls Harry and Hermione behind a towering oak tree.
